translations: 普遍存在的，无所不在的

sentences.sentence: The ubiquitous BAM is starting a new trend and I am convinced that many will follow it.
sentences.translation: 无处不在的 BAM 正在开始一种新趋势，我坚信许多人将追随这一趋势。

sentences.sentence: "I can envision a future in which robotic devices will become a nearly ubiquitous part of our day-to-day lives," says Gates.
sentences.translation: 盖茨说：“我可以预见，在未来，机器人设备将成为我们日常生活中几乎无处不在的一部分。”

sentences.sentence: It could purr along like any luxury car or, at a press of the ubiquitous sport button, growl loudly as you disappear down the road.
sentences.translation: 它可以像任何一辆豪华轿车一样低吟前行，而一旦你按下那个无所不在的运动按钮，车便咆哮着瞬间消失在路上。
